name: Adam Summer Set silk Tie + Cufflink  + Hanky  C03
description: NEW Design in our Summer Collection Black Label Summer 2007 100% Jacquard woven silk neck tie. Amazingly soft, Luxury at your finger tips. This tie brings together a traditional Italian pattern of blue paisleys to help accentuate any power suit. Compliments are guaranteed. The Cufflinks are made of brass and use the same exact silk as the tie. These cufflinks will perfectly match the tie as a complete matching set. The Handkerchief is also made from the same exact silk as the tie. It is a square hanky, 100% silk woven Made in Italy
